definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: A kind of the steel blackening agent performance satisfactorily was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了一种性能优良的钢铁常温发黑处理剂。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method of preparing and using a new room-temperature quick phosphating solution.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新型常温快速磷化液的配制和使用方法。

sentences.english: The study was to provide the theoretical basis for room temperature storage of Eucalyptus globulus seeds.
sentences.chinese: 为蓝桉种子的常温贮藏提供理论依据。

sentences.english: We analyzed in brief main uncertainty of ultrasonic measurement in six-side anvil cell at 300K.
sentences.chinese: 分析了六面顶压机上常温超声测量的主要误差来源。

sentences.english: The normal temperature solidified fluoro - coating has outstanding advantages .
sentences.chinese: 常温固化氟涂料具有卓越的性能。

sentences.english: Soluble in water at room temperature and formed a gel-like solution.
sentences.chinese: 常温下溶于水，形成胶体状溶液。

sentences.english: It is not suitable to open lamp of normal temperature and it has more excellent brightness in luminaire fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 不适用常温敞开式灯具，在泛光灯具内亮度更好。

sentences.english: A kind of better anti corrosive phosphorated liquid operating at normal temperature was got.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种常温抗蚀性的新型磷化液。

sentences.english: Steel blackening process under room temperature has been analyzed and possible mechanism of film formation discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析钢铁常温发黑过程，探讨其可能的成膜机理。

sentences.english: The room temperature superconductor has been the "snark" of modern materials science...
sentences.chinese: 常温超导体早已成为现代科学材料中的奢侈品。

sentences.english: A zinc-series phosphating process at room temperature was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了一种常温锌系磷化工艺。

sentences.english: Serve puddings warm or at room temperature with whipped cream and warm caramel sauce.
sentences.chinese: 将奶油和热焦糖搅拌，和温过或常温布丁一起呈上。

sentences.english: However, the traditional method to obtain PAMAM dendrimer is a rough and time-consuming process, resulting in a high synthesis cost.
sentences.chinese: 但常温下合成树形分子的周期较长，致使其成本高。

sentences.english: Residuals are room-temperature solids made up of molecules with 30 or more carbons.
sentences.chinese: 常温下为固体的残余物是由30或更多的碳组成。

sentences.english: Sorbitol took an effect on controlling weight loss of strawberry at normal temperature.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇能起到良好的控制草莓在常温下的失重问题。

sentences.english: Why does room-temperature coffee taste so bad?
sentences.chinese: 常温的咖啡为何这么难喝？

definition: refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
